channel.title: Dark Knight's Sword[V2]
channel.description:
[B]I spent time to make this model, screenshot, and thread; the least you can do is take a minute of your time to comment[/b]
Well, i havent really shown off anythign here lately, so i thought id make something simple, yet amusing. Now i've had many people say to me "Dylan, you spend too much time and detail on the hilt and make the blade plain" so i figured hey, this time i was going to use a different approach and gave it what i think is a "unique" blade, yet at the same time sharp and consisting of basic sword aspects.
Here it is: The Dark Knight's Sword
Hilt View [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DarkKnightSword.jpg[/img]
Pummel/Handle [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DarkKnightSword03.jpg[/img]
Blade View [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DarkKnightSword2.jpg[/img]
Top View [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DarkKnightSword04.jpg[/img]
Now yes, the lightings a little off, i know. its the last thing on my mind to update atm.
Version 2 [August 14 12:30] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/DarkKnightSwordv2jpg.jpg[/img] Shortened handle. made the centre blade ridge a little more clear Criticism is welcomed within reason. please stay on topic.

item.title: Dark Knight's Sword[V2]
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

I can’t tell if it’s the lighting or not, but the center of the blade seems to be off (where it rises a bit)
Other than that it looks nice

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Knight's Sword[V2]
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Yeah and the geometry on your handle is weird when it’s poking out. It’s a little square too. Please, bevel the edge around the blade of the sword. And what sanga said.

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Knight's Sword[V2]
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

metal texture needs a bit of work on the blade

Read full topic

item.title: Dark Knight's Sword[V2]
item.dc:creator: @time_of_rune time of rune
item.description:
@time_of_rune wrote:

cocoa:

Handle is too long.

If it’s intended to be a 1 handed sword. If it’s supposed to be a 2 handed sword, the blade should be a bit longer.

Overall though, GREAT sword.

Read full topic
